ygData.subject: Re: "Back for the Attack" - Dokken

X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: Yanshosh@...

::Demise/EndBringer/Incarcinator/Zardus/Killfest/Firearm/Fliq/Grimmler/Kluster/Scyther::

Demise clenched his teeth as fire was breathed over his face. He
ignores the head, which his armor was doing a good job of being almost
immune to, and gives Flesh Ripper's arm another yank. Opening his
mouth, he bites down at Flesh Ripper's head. If the bite was
successful, he'd hang on.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer jumps, several shots hitting his armor but his tentacles
still manage to wrap around Imprisoner's cannon, setting EndBringer on
the tank's back. He roars, letting loose a deadly stream of
electricity from his tentacles. Even a tank like this would be hurt
from it.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Incarcinator easily flies out of the way of the shots heading for him,
seeing that Shockwave was pulling upward. That might soon be a
problem, as being so high up made it easy for Incarcinator to dodge or
destroy almost anything heading for him.

Aiming his rifle, he fires three explosive shells, all going at an
increadable speed, heading head on at Shockwave.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The three missiles from Zardus turned, flying at Unitron from behind.
Zardus pulls up, two missiles flying by under him and quickly
destroyed by two optic blasts. Shots from Tuefel hit him, sending him
flying backwards, though not out of control.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Killfest destroys two signature-seeking missiles with three optic
blasts, and then fires two missiles at Vehement. These ones spread out
and then flew at the Archbishop from different directions.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm finally finds his way out of the Element, looking around at
the battle. He swears to himself, transforming into tank mode and
riding off toward the fighting bots, his side-mounted missile launcher
firing two missiles at Predator.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Fliq, tired of waiting for the bot he was with to respond, runs out of
the Cybertronian Fire, his rifle in hand. He takes careful aim, firing
three laser bolts at Choran.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster, seeing a whole lot of missiles heading for the CF, fires his
missile launcher twice, one of the missiles getting close to Double
Punch's four and exploding, taking the four missiles with it.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler spins in the air to get out of the way of some weaponfire,
and then fires two missiles at Unicron's back.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Seeing Injector being blown backwards, Scyther turns his attention
back to Double Punch, firing three charges at him.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Orchid and Icedemon, I've been waiting for you to post damage, but
under 
> pressure from the Red Menace I'm posting anyway)
> 
> Also, can someone post damage for the CF?  No one has responded to
my attacks 
> on it for my last few posts.)
> 
> The Protectobots/The Oblitercons/Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark
Claw/Nemesis
>
Enforcer/Scattershot/Imprisoner/Predator/Choran/Shockwave/Unitron/Firestarter/
> Double Punch/Manterror/Injector/Vehement/Sun
Crusher/Reflector/Smokescreen/
> Serpentor:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Demon Wulf, who is still flying upwards, slid sideways through the
air, being 
> stricken with a dozen rapid blasts that lightly dented his armor
frame.  The 
> rest of the blasts went upwards away from him.
> 
> "Pests." he growled, raising his sword and firing off an
energy-signature 
> seeking missile from the sword at Alecto.  With a flash the blade
was 
> replaced on the sword.  
> 
> ---
> 
> Flesh Ripper was still going up, most shots heading for him missing,
only a 
> couple actually hitting him, some even heading towards Demise.
> 
> Flesh Ripper's arm stayed intact, due to the efforts of Demise. 
Letting out 
> a deep growl in his throat, a "continuous" burst of flames launched
from his 
> mouth into Demise's face.
> 
> ---
> 
> Dark Claw began to slowly rise, only recently entering biped mode. 
He formed 
> an orb in his left palm, throwing the explosive orb of energy at the 
> Cybertronian Fire as he began to gain altitude.
> 
> ---
> 
> Dark One was only halfway done with Hiss, and surprisingly he hadn't
been 
> shot to hell from behind.  He continued his work with actual
concern.
> 
> ---
> 
> Breakdown rolled on the ground, one stinger missile hitting the
ground no 
> where near him, the other striking dead on.  He let out a scream of
pain, 
> reaching for an area of his back he couldn't get to where a small
smoking 
> hole was.
> 
> ---
> 
> Pyro coughed up some mech-fluid, trying to sit up and failing
miserably at it.
> 
> ---
> 
> Hiss and Scavenger still KO.  Nuff said.
> 
> ---
> 
> Hot Spot looked at the five Headstrong's surrounding him and yelped,
punching 
> at one and missing, an attack from the real one sending him crashing
down to 
> the ground. 
> 
> ---
> 
> Groove finally collected his thoughts, firing off three photon
blasts at 
> Abominous' chest.
> 
> "Eat that Deceptislime!  You'll wish you had stayed extinct when I'm
done 
> with you!"
> 
> ---
> 
> (Not sure if Abominous replied)
> Blades armed another missile tube, launching a missile off at
Abominous' 
> cervix.
> 
> ---
> 
> First Aid looked to Firedrill with no sign of recognition.  "Do...I
know you?"
> 
> ---
> 
> The Autobot warrior still lay on the ground, still preparing for a
second 
> wind.
> 
> ---
> 
> Being bigger than a tank, EndBringer's attempt at trying to grab
Imprisoner 
> wasn't having much of an effect.
> 
> "Idiot..." he chuckled, the cannon on his turret turning to point at 
> EndBringer and fire fifteen rapid laser blasts at him.
> 
> At that time, both missile tubes in Imprisoner's attack vehicle mode
launched 
> off a total of four missiles at the Cybertronian Fire (two from
both).
> 
> ---
> 
> Predator rolled, avoiding some shots.  He looked at the ground and
made his 
> best attempt at a whistling sound.  He raised his launcher, firin
off two 
> rockets at the Cybertronian Fire.
> 
> ---
> 
> Charon raised his rifle, firing off twenty-five rapid laser bolts at 
> Incarcinator.
> 
> ---
> 
> Shockwave's sensors detected an incoming object to fast to move,
being as big 
> as he was.  A bullet went straight through his wing and kept going
down.
> 
> "Intriguing." he intoned.  He armed his launchers, pulling up and
firing off 
> ten rapid laser bolts at Incarcinator and launching a single missile
off at 
> Dollon.
> 
> ---
> 
> Unitron had quite a bit of firepower.  Luckily, it wasn't all
missiles.  He 
> spun quickly, several shots digging themselves into his frame.  He
pulled up 
> as three missiles from Zardus passed by harmlessly.  The fourth,
being a 
> normal one, exploded near Unitron, sending him spinning out of
control 
> through the air.
> 
> ---
> 
> Firestarter felt an explosion as a deep gash was ripped open in his
cockpit.
> 
> "ARGH!" he yelled, heading straight for the Cybertronian Fire.  He
fired 
> fifteen rapid laser blasts at the Maximal craft, able to flip away
from a 
> head on collision with the ship.  Kamikazeeing wasn't on his mind
right now.
> 
> He armed his missile launchers, firing off two energy-signature
seeking 
> missiles at Zardus, the missiles approaching the Alliance "leader"
from 
> seperate directions.
> 
> ---
> 
> Beeline the annoying cyber-bee launched off three optic blasts.  The
third 
> optic blast hit a missile heading for Vehement.
> 
> ---
> 
> Double Punch, not being attacked, turned his attention elsewhere. 
Raising 
> his left pincher he launched off two missiles at the Cybertronian
Fire.  He 
> did the same from his right pincher, two more instruments of
destruction 
> heading for the beaten-looking craft.
> 
> ---
> 
> Injector fired two stinger missiles, both prematurely exploding. 
Eight laser 
> blasts from Underground and Sharpclaws got through though and struck
him in 
> the chest, sending him flying back out of the way of Scyther's
grenade.
> 
> (By the way, Yan, Injector is in the air so you can't land next to
him...I 
> think)
> 
> ---
> 
> Manterror didn't like this.  All twenty-five laser blasts from
Perceptor 
> struck him.  After managing to stay aloft in the air, he looked down 
> momentarily to see a wide crack in his exo-skeleton.
> 
> "Slagger!" was all he yelled, raising both arms and firing a total
of four 
> ion disks at Perceptor (two ion disks from each arm).
> 
> ---
> 
> Vehement raised his left hand, palm extended towards Killfest's
approaching 
> weapons fire.  A sonic wave erupted from his hand at the incoming
blasts.  
> Everything was intercepted.
> 
> Raising his other arm he launched two energy-signature seeking
missiles at 
> Killfest.
> 
> A dozen shots struck Vehement from behind.  "Ugh..." he sighed,
looking back 
> as the blasts did only slight damage that couldn't be seen
(Vehement's armor 
> being pure black, so scorch marks wouldn't show well).   "Heathen
fool."
> 
> The Brotherhood leader's optics were glowing brightly for a second,
and then 
> three optic blasts lanced out at Darkfate's sternum.
> 
> ---
> 
> Sun Crusher saw two inbound missiles and simply fired a few optic
blasts to 
> intercept them.  "Leave now, heathen, or be slain." he said to
Luzbel as he 
> fired off two energy-signature seeking missiles at him/her.  He
looked to 
> Vehement's battle, and returned his attention back to his own fight
seeing 
> everything under control.
> 
> ---
> 
> Reflector saw quite a few shots heading from him thanks to a double
team on 
> his self.  He launched a missile that prematurely exploded, but
still shots 
> got through and pelted his torso.  He went back through the air a
few feet.  
> But he stabalized himself, lookin at the deep dents in his armor.
> 
> "Ow." he said mockingly, able to keep the actual pain from showing
his face.  
> He raised both arms, the double-barrels on his wrists launching a
missile 
> each.
> 
> Two missiles headed for Charon (from the left launcher on his
wrist), and two 
> others headed for Atilla (from the other launcher on the other
wrist).  But 
> one heading for Atilla seemed to miss the target.  But it didn't and
was on a 
> direct course with the Cybertronian Fire.  After all, the Evil One's
orders 
> were to take out the CF as much as possible.
> 
> ---
> 
> Smokescreen attempted to get another bead on Vehement, all this
weapons fire 
> on him making it hard.
> 
> ---
> 
> Scattershot got to a nice height and pulled somethings out of
subspace.  He 
> let out a manical laugh as he dropped two charges set to explode on
impact 
> down towards Abominous.
> 
> "Death from above!"
> 
> ---
> 
> Nemesis Enforcer thrust his left wing up as Serpentor slashed down,
the 
> snake's blade being blocked by the bat's wing.
> 
> Getting up Nemesis sent a quick punch to Serpentor's abdomen.
> 
> ---
> 
> Letting out an "Oof!" Serpentor was slightly bent over.  He looked
up and 
> quickly raised his blade, barely blocking Nemesis' own blade and
saving 
> himself from decapitation.  He pushed forward on the blade.  "This
ends now, 
> fool!"
